name: HeartbreakRecovery
0:
”Alexa, open heartbreak recovery”
”Alexa, start heartbreak recovery”
”Alexa, launch heartbreak recovery”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: heartbreak recovery
des: Heartbreak Recovery provides you with some advice and music to help you get through a bad break up. This skill will help you maintain good mental health both during and after a difficult separation. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
